name: Crazi Taxi : a Funny take on Toon Games
short_description: The game stars, of course, Johnny Bravo who is quite in a fickle as we mentioned earlier. The objective here is to properly kick the ball to the goal while avoiding the two goalkeepers, who changes position in every level. In order to crazy taxi do that, you should watch out for the altitude and power meters, located just in front of Johnny. Click at the precise moment and the ball goes through the net, hit it with the wrong timing and the ball goes either to one of the goalkeepers head or stomach or nowhere at all. Not so difficult to understand, right? But that just toon games for you.
summary: Crazy taxi has always been known as a very flamboyant playboy througho
